message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for 95.

Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway, but $95 is still a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. This is my final offer, and if we can't agree on this, I'll have to go with John's offer.
I understand you're willing to go to 90, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'll meet you at 92.5. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll really like the product.
